name: inordinately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is much more than usual or expected: She was inordinately fond of her pets. The day was inordinately hot. See
inordinate
More examplesFewer examplesShe had inordinately large feet for her height.He was an inordinately talented drummer.We've received an inordinately large number of complaints.
